monster.name: Agent (Shadowmaster)

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: +equals the mentor's bonus

trait.name: HP
trait.text: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Saving Throws
trait.text: +PB to all

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Acrobatics +3 plus PB, Deception +2 plus PB, Perception + 0 plus PB, Stealth +3 plus PB

trait.name: 3rd Level: Shadow Gate (3/Day)
trait.text: As a bonus action, the agent teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. The next time the agent hits a creature with a signature attack before the end of their next turn, the attack deals an extra PB piercing damage.

trait.name: 5th Level: Dark Strike (3/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the agent makes a signature attack, then places infernal seals on the target. The next time the target is hit by an attack, the seals burn darkly, dealing an extra PBd6 necrotic damage to the target.

trait.name: 7th Level: Seal Fate (1/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the agent makes two signature attacks against a creature. If one or both attacks hit, the target's speed is reduced to 0 and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the agent's next turn.

action.name: Signature Attack (Daggers)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 plus PB piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the agent can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

monster.description:
Rules for retainers appear in the "Retainers" section of Flee, Mortals! Using those rules, you can add this illrigger retainer to your game.
Source: The Illrigger Revised p. 35

monster.name: Bloodletter (Sanguine Knight)

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: +equals the mentor's bonus

trait.name: HP
trait.text: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Saving Throws
trait.text: +PB to all

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Intimidation +2 plus PB, Medicine +0 plus PB

trait.name: 3rd Level: Exsanguinate (3/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the bloodletter makes a signature attack, then grants an ally they can see within 30 feet of them PBd6 temporary hit points.

trait.name: 5th Level: Rubescent Protector (3/Day)
trait.text: When an ally the bloodletter can see within 10 feet of them is hit with an attack, the bloodletter can use their reaction to redirect the attack to themself, potentially causing the attack to miss. If the attacker is within 10 feet of the bloodletter, the bloodletter can then make a signature attack against the attacker.

trait.name: 7th Level: Fuilech (3/Day)
trait.text: When the bloodletter hits a creature with a signature attack, they can use their reaction to siphon the creature's vitality. For 1 minute, the bloodletter empowers up to three creatures they can see within 30 feet of them (potentially including themself), granting those creatures a bonus to saving throws equal to half the bloodletter's PB.

action.name: Signature Attack (Halberd)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 plus PB to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 plus PB slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the bloodletter can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

monster.name: Deceiver (Architect of Ruin)

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: +equals the mentor's bonus

trait.name: HP
trait.text: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Saving Throws
trait.text: +PB to all

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Arcana +1 plus PB, Deception +3 plus PB, Persuasion +3 plus PB

trait.name: 3rd Level: Hell's Lash (3/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the deceiver lashes a whip of crimson energy between them and a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a DC 10 plus PB Constitution saving throw or take PBd4 fire damage and be tethered. A tethered creature takes PBd4 damage at the beginning of each of their turns. A tethered creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: 5th Level: Armor of Deception (3/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the deceiver weaves frightening illusions around a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The illusions last for 1 minute. A creature who attacks the target while the illusions are active must succeed on a DC 10 plus PB Wisdom saving throw or take PBd6 psychic damage and be frightened until the end of their next turn. A creature who succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

trait.name: 7th Level: Mote of Hell (1/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the deceiver manifests a pocket of Hell, creating a 15-foot- radius sphere of brimstone and darkness centered on a point within 150 feet of them. That area becomes difficult terrain. A creature who starts their turn in that area or enters it for the first time on a turn takes PBd6 fire damage. A creature who ends their turn in that area must succeed on a DC 10 plus PB Wisdom saving throw or take PBd6 psychic damage from the screams of the damned in their mind.

action.name: Signature Attack (Hellfire)
action.text: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 necrotic damage plus 1d4 fire damage. Both of the spell's damage types increase by 1d4 when the deceiver reaches 5th level (2d4 each), 11th level (3d4 each), and 17th level (4d4 each).

monster.name: Schemer (Hellspeaker)

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: +equals the mentor's bonus

trait.name: HP
trait.text: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Saving Throws
trait.text: +PB to all

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Deception +3 plus PB, Insight +1 plus PB, Persuasion +3 plus PB

trait.name: 3rd Level: Quick Trick (3/Day)
trait.text: When a creature targets the schemer or an ally within 30 feet of the schemer with an attack, spell, or other magical effect, the schemer can use their reaction to force that creature to make a DC 10 plus PB Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature must choose a new target or lose the attack or effect.

trait.name: 5th Level: Promises and Lies (1/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the schemer turns enemies into allies. Each creature within 30 feet of the schemer who can hear them and who understand Common or Infernal must succeed on a DC 10 plus PB Charisma saving throw or be charmed by the schemer for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, a creature can't willingly harm any of the schemer's allies. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending the effect on themself on a success.

trait.name: 7th Level: Turncoat (3/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the schemer chooses up to PB creatures they can see within 30 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a DC 10 plus PB Charisma saving throw or make an attack against their nearest ally (no action required). A creature charmed by the schemer automatically fails this saving throw.

action.name: Signature Attack (Daggers)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 plus PB damage. Beginning at 7th level, the schemer can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

monster.name: Tyrant (Painkiller)

trait.name: Proficiency Bonus
trait.text: +equals the mentor's bonus

trait.name: HP
trait.text: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Saving Throws
trait.text: +PB to all

trait.name: Skill
trait.text: Athletics +3 plus PB, Intimidation +2 plus PB

trait.name: 3rd Level: Shift Ranks (3/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the tyrant makes a signature attack and allows up to three allies within 30 feet of them who can hear them to move up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks (no action required).

trait.name: 5th Level: Devastation (3/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the tyrant makes a signature attack, and up to three allies within 30 feet of them who can hear them can use their reaction to make one weapon attack.

trait.name: 7th Level: Choke (1/Day)
trait.text: As an action, the tyrant makes a signature attack; if the attack hits, the tyrant chokes the target with infernal magic. The target is grappled (escape DC 10 plus PB) and restrained until the grapple ends.

action.name: Signature Attack (Longsword)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 plus PB slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the tyrant can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.
